page.title: 11INTERESTING PEOPLE
page.content: Mr Arthur: Mr Arthur is a Senior Agriculture Inspector, he is employed by the Department of Agriculture and Fisheries for Scotland. His office is in Cameron House, Albany Street, Oban. His job involves assesing land cover around the Oban area. To do this he has to walk over all the land and decide for himself the quality and use of the land. He does this to advise local farmers about optimum use for their land and to decide on grants available to the farmers for things like fencing. The information he collects can be used by bigger landusers as well such as, Forestry Commision and Highlands and Islands Development Board. Within a days work he may well travel over one hundred miles around the area.
